name: Ritesh Modi
top_product: Complete Smart Security Solutions by PrivateEye At PrivateEye – Aapki Teesri Aankh, a brand by Anitesh Techtronics Pvt. Ltd., we deliver end-to-end surveillance and security solutions designed to keep homes, businesses, and institutions safe, smart, and connected. Our wide range of innovative products includes: CCTV Surveillance Systems – HD, IP, AI-based, and 360° coverage cameras Wi-Fi & 4G Smart Cameras – View anytime, anywhere, directly from your phone Biometric Attendance & Access Control Systems – Ideal for offices, schools & societies Video Door Phones & Smart Doorbells – Know who’s at your door before you open it Fire Alarm & Smoke Detection Systems – Early alerts to prevent major incidents Intruder & Security Alarm Systems – Instant alerts against unauthorized access Car DVR & Vehicle Surveillance Cameras – For cars, school buses & fleet tracking GPS Tracking Devices – Real-time location, route history & geofencing Smart Home Automation Solutions – Control lights, locks & security with one touch Public Address (PA) & IP Audio Systems – For offices, schools & large campuses Networking & Server Solutions – The backbone for seamless security integration Annual Maintenance Contracts (AMC) – Regular upkeep for peak performance > From a single camera to a fully automated surveillance network — PrivateEye delivers technology that lets you see, secure, and stay in control.
ideal_referral: If you know anyone who wants to live life with true peace of mind, please connect them with PrivateEye – Aapki Teesri Aankh. We help homeowners, business owners, and property managers secure their most valuable spaces with advanced CCTV surveillance systems that protect 24×7 — so they can rest easy knowing their world is safe. With PrivateEye, they’ll experience: Smart, AI-based CCTV solutions Real-time remote monitoring Professional installation & maintenance Trusted brands like CP Plus, Hikvision, Dahua, and Honeywell > Because with PrivateEye, you don’t just install cameras — you install peace of mind.
top_problem_solved: At PrivateEye – Aapki Teesri Aankh, we believe true security means being ready when it matters most. Oct 2025, Jawaharlal Nehru Architecture and Fine Arts University (JNAFAU) faced a crisis — a high-voltage surge had knocked out all 72 CCTV cameras just a day before a major cultural event attended by the Honorable Chief Minister. We received an urgent call that afternoon — our team immediately mobilized. Some cameras were burnt, cables damaged — but there was no time to waste. Our technicians worked tirelessly through the night, replacing cameras, redoing cabling, and restoring the entire system. By Monday morning, every camera was back online, ensuring smooth monitoring and complete safety for the high-profile event. Our team even stayed on-site till the program concluded — because at PrivateEye, > we don’t leave until you’re secure.
my_favourite_bni_story: Before joining BNI, I used to do 3 CCTV installations a week. After joining BNI, I started doing 3 installations a day! That’s the power of trusted referrals and strong relationships. BNI didn’t just grow my business — it multiplied my confidence, connections, and success stories. Every week, I get new opportunities — from homes and schools to factories and commercial buildings — all through the amazing support of my BNI family. Because with BNI and PrivateEye – Aapki Teesri Aankh, > we’re not just watching growth… we’re living it, every single day.
